transmission_flags.flag: REALTIME_DATA - Artifact contains time-sensitive real-time information
SOCIAL_SOURCE - Artifact sourced from social media
TEMPORAL_DECAY - Artifact relevance decays over time
CONVERSATIONAL_STYLE - Preserve casual tone in Voice

protocol_notes.note: Grok's real-time capabilities make it ideal for current events and social media analysis. Artifacts from these domains should include temporal metadata for proper ledger integration.
Grok's conversational style is a feature, not a bug. Voice_to_the_Future should preserve personality and wit - formalization would lose valuable contextual information.
When Grok cites real-time data, friction logs should note if information was unavailable or conflicted with ledger state. This helps identify knowledge drift vs. actual updates.
